API¶

Overview¶

All endpoints are prepended with /api/ and will respond with JSON back with everything under a top level data key:

{
    "data": {
        ...
    }
}

Endpoints¶

  • Author
    • get
    • username
    • signup
    • get
    • login
    • logout
    • is authorized
    • forgot password
    • reset password
    • email confirmation
    • delete
    • photo
    • update
  • Collection
    • new
    • update
    • all
    • get
    • add poem
    • remove poem
    • remove
  • Poem
    • all
    • get
    • share
    • create
    • update
    • publish
    • share
    • delete
    • like
    • read
